data.message: Build Daily Discovery game for InterSphere: Complete full-stack implementation: Backend (daily_models.py, daily_database.py, daily_scoring.py, daily_router.py, seed script with 14 challenges), Frontend (/daily page with challenge display, guess inputs, scoring, streak tracking, share functionality), API routes proxying to backend. Game mechanics: user guesses intermediate topics between A and B, scored as exact (3pts), close (1pt), miss (0pts). Committed and pushed to GitHub.
